SEARCH
Package gw.api.databuilder

Class RecoveryBuilder

java.lang.Object
gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<Recovery,RecoveryBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.CCDataBuilder<Recovery,RecoveryBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.TransactionBuilder<Recovery,RecoveryBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.RecoveryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DelegateDataBuilder<Recovery>, ValueGenerator<Recovery>
public class RecoveryBuilder extends TransactionBuilder<Recovery,RecoveryBuilder>
Builder to create Recovery transaction entities.

Notes:

  • To set the Amount of the transaction, use withLineItem().
  • You must call withStatus() to set the Status on the transaction. When create() is called, this method sets up the Taccounts for the transaction given its status and other fields.

    • uiReadyRecovery

      public static RecoveryBuilder uiReadyRecovery(ReserveLine reserveLine, RecoveryCategory category, CurrencyAmount amount)

    • uiReadyRecovery

      public static RecoveryBuilder uiReadyRecovery(ValueGenerator<? extends Claim> claim, CurrencyAmount amount)
      Returns a claim-level RecoveryBuilder, on the specified claim, with a single lineitem with the specified amount, in the currency of the specified amount, on an arbitrary costtype and costcategory, in submitted mode. If the costtype and/or costcategory may be important, it is recommended to explicitly specify them.
      Parameters:
      claim - a ValueGenerator that generates the claim that this recovery will be coded to
      amount - amount of the recovery
      Returns:
      ui-ready RecoveryBuilder

    • uiReadyRecovery

      public static RecoveryBuilder uiReadyRecovery(Claim claim, CurrencyAmount amount)
      Returns a claim-level RecoveryBuilder, on the specified claim, with a single lineitem with the specified amount, on an arbitrary costtype and costcategory, in submitted mode. If the costtype and/or costcategory may be important, it is recommended to explicitly specify them.
      Parameters:
      claim - claim that this recovery will be coded to
      amount - amount of the recovery
      Returns:
      ui-ready RecoveryBuilder

    • uiReadyRecoveryExpense

      public static RecoveryBuilder uiReadyRecoveryExpense(Claim claim, CurrencyAmount amount)

    • uiReadyRecovery

      public static RecoveryBuilder uiReadyRecovery(Exposure exposure, CurrencyAmount amount)
      Returns a exposure-level RecoveryBuilder, on the specified claim, with a single lineitem with the specified amount, in the currency of the specified amount, on an arbitrary costtype and costcategory, in submitted mode. If the costtype and/or costcategory may be important, it is recommended to explicitly specify them.
      Parameters:
      exposure - a ValueGenerator that generates the exposure that this recovery will be coded to
      amount - amount of the recovery
      Returns:
      ui-ready RecoveryBuilder
